overview: San Bernardino has a long history as a railroad town. It's been a home to the Santa Fe, now the BNSF railway since the 1800's. Their "A" and "B" yards provide plenty of action. We'll view Amtrak's Southwest Chief at Rana and catch 4-8-4 #3571 at the San Bernardino 2011 and 2014 Railroad Days.
title: San Bernardino, California
